mapper.select: SELECT job_no jobNo, job_category jobCategory FROM linkjobs_job
SELECT job2_no job2No, job2_category job2Category, job_no jobNo FROM linkjobs_job2 ORDER BY jobNo, job2No
SELECT job3_no job3No, job3_category job3Category, job2_no job2No FROM linkjobs_job3 ORDER BY job2No, job3No
SELECT job.job_category, job2.job2_category FROM linkjobs_job job INNER JOIN linkjobs_job2 job2 ON job.job_no=job2.job_no WHERE job.job_no=#{jobNo}
